displaytitle: Centaur charging His bow as a satyr with a quiver mounts
medium: Pen and brown ink, gray-brown wash over black chalk on off-white laid paper
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed: L.r.: Dom. Tiepolo f; u.l.: 17, below canceled word; l.c.v.: 348; c.v.: gli amori De' Centauri colle ninfe boscherate - Disegno...

titles.title: Centaur charging His bow as a satyr with a quiver mounts
